headline: Mark Cuban urges Congress to make healthcare companies divest
summary: Healthcare affordability is in focus as lawmakers meet with health insurance executives on Capitol Hill. Additionally, Mark Cuban called on Congress to make health insurance companies divest from all non-insurance assets. Capital Alpha Partners founding partner Kim Monk sits down with Market Domination host Josh Lipton to explain why this is unlikely to happen. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Democrats & Republicans find some common ground on health insurers
summary: Health insurance companies are in focus after executives met with US lawmakers on Capitol Hill to address affordability concerns and rising healthcare costs. Capital Alpha Partners founding partner Kim Monk joins Market Domination with Josh Lipton to discuss takeaways from the hearing. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Top Stock Reports for Microsoft, Anheuser-Busch & CVS Health
summary: Microsoft's strong cash flows, Azure's 25% cloud share and AI integration drive performance, even as rising debt, capex needs and competition pose risks.

headline: CVS Health (CVS) Valuation Check As Regulatory Scrutiny And Legal Outcomes Draw Investor Focus
summary: Regulatory and legal scrutiny is back in focus for CVS Health (CVS), as a U.S. House Judiciary Committee probe into its pharmacy benefit manager practices unfolds, while a separate class action over prescription drug pricing has been dismissed. See our latest analysis for CVS Health. For context, CVS Health shares now trade at US$82.68, with a 30 day share price return of 5.95% and a year to date share price return of 3.18%, while the 1 year total shareholder return of 59.48% reflects how...

headline: CVS Health supports communities as major winter storm approaches
summary: CVS Health® (NYSE: CVS) is actively preparing for the major winter storm expected to impact much of the country over the next few days. The company's priority is the health and safety of its customers, members and colleagues, and is committed to providing communities with access to the products and services they need to plan for snow, ice, and potential power outages.

headline: Express Scripts considering settlement in FTC insulin price lawsuit
summary: The antitrust agency paused its lawsuit against the pharmacy benefit manager while the two discuss a proposed consent agreement.
